评论详情: Just wore these on a 2 week trip to Australia. Very comfortable out of the box with no blisters or any rubbing. Supportive enough for many miles of walking in varied conditions. True to size. Still look great. Only issue was keeping the laces tied tightly but that may be my tying method. Recommend.
Love the wide toe box.  Comfortable shoes.  Pricey … but worth it.

评论概述: I’ll fitting, leaving my foot swollen, bruised, and painful
评论详情: I loved the look of the shoes. They were roomy in the toe box and I definitely didn’t feel my foot squeezed in any way. I have worn them here and there, mostly around the house or getting in and out of the car as I chauffeured my kids around. Yesterday was the first time I spent the full day in them as well as walking around IKEA. I started feeling an uncomfortable feeling at the heel end of my arch. By the time I got home, my heel/arch area was tender, swollen, and bruised all the way up to my ankle.  I’m extremely disappointed and won’t be buying Keens again.
Comfortable

UPDATE!!!*** 1/20/25 I LOVE THESE SHOES!!! They are so comfortable and effortlessly so. I've worn them non-stop out and about the last few days. No rub spots. No strain, no pain. PERFECT!!!!  ************************************** Straight outta the box these were comfortable. I am compatible with Keen in general. These are cute and comfortable. As a large footed person that's a RARE combo!  I have big feet. 10 1/2 or 11 sometimes 10 depending on the brand. I usually wear Saucony but once I went Hoka it was hard to go back to Saucony, they just don't have the support and something was off on the width regardless if I go wide. I've had trouble finding Hoka locally to try on so enter Keen. I've had a pair of hiking shoes which have been amazing. I ordered a pair of sandals last summer which I also love. But I needed something to replace my 2+ yr old Hokas for everyday wear, walking, errands etc. I don't have an extra wide foot, it's just big but I've never had any issues with Keen as is. I definitely think they have a comfortably ample toe box.  These shoes have a retro feel to them. They almost remind me of the Roos back in elementary in the 80s. 😂 Minus the pocket.  Anyhow if you know Keen, they are a decent shoe at many price points. This one is no different. Not only found them on sale so they are even less than Hokas.  I'll definitely update once I wear them out and about. But just walking around the house they are very comfortable.  For the win!

I never thought to look at the brand keen when looking for a very comfortable tennis shoe. However, after my husband expressed how comfortable his Keen work boots were, I decided to give them. I am so happy that I did. These run true to size, I am a 9 1/2. They’re extremely comfortable. I would compare them to a comfort level to my ON’s.
It's a decent tennis shoe, just to manly looking for my taste. Had to send it back.

I bought these shoes right before a trip to Europe.  These were very comfortable out of the box (I didn't have a lot of time to break them in).  They were also stylish so I received many compliments.  My favorite part about them was the traction.  It was grey and rainy most of our trip, but I felt confident walking on the wet cobblestones, etc.  They do run a bit larger.  I ordered my normal size (7.5) and probably could have done a 7.  However, I did wear thicker warm socks over my normal socks, so they worked perfectly.

I love these shoes! They do run a bit wide (which I love!) and there is a lot of space  for my toes. They took quite a while to break in, but have easily become the most comfortable shoe I own!They are great on more rough terrain, but walking on smoother surfaces is  difficult! They don't quite "grip" like my other shoes do, so I slip and slide when I wear them. That includes walking on the road or sidewalk after it rains! I never had that happen with any other shoe, but I'm only knocking one star off for that since everything else about these shoes is absolutely perfect!
Very durable well built shoe with retro styling
These are the best pair of shoes I have bought. I wear them at work with dress pants and they look nice. Of course they look great on blue jean day!
The are super cute and comfy.  Very roomy in the toebed like most keens are.  Love them.

评论概述: Not my usual style but comfy
评论详情: The shoes have a nice stylish look to them, clean stitching and good “tread”. The fit was true to size but a tad wide. I’ve only worn them a handful of times but overall very comfy. They are a bit heaving than the style of tennis/casual shoes I wear but it was not hard to adjust.

评论概述: KEEN Women's Ks86 Comfortable Durable Retro Style Sneakers
评论详情: I love my new Keen sneakers! They are comfortable and pretty! Toe box provides enough space too! I highly recommend.

Amazing shoe!!! This shoe is so comfortable and stylish at the same time. True size! I have worn these to hike, walk and jog in. My feet were so happy. Great shoe and I will definitely buy another pair.

These shoes are really cute so I'm disappointed that they don't work for me.  I ordered 9.5 which is what I wear in other Keens but these feel off to me. I may try a half size smaller but not sure if that'll work.

These sneakers are super comfy and stylish.  Love the color! I think they might just be my new favorite sneakers. I typically wear a size 9 and they fit as expected. My toes aren’t squished. They have good traction as most Keen shoes do. Good support. I will be getting these in a second color!
Great fit and support and a fun shoe to wear
I was disappointed. I love them .. however, the left shoes feels bigger than the right.
Great shoes
These run quite wide. Too wide for me and I have a somewhat wide foot.

I was excited to receive these shoes because they were cute and styled exactly as I expected. However, the quality was extremely disappointing, especially for a brand like Keen. The sizing was completely off – I typically wear an 8 in Salomon, Nike, New Balance, and other major brands, but the size 8 in these was easily a full size too big. The width also felt more like a wide than a regular fit. Additionally, there was absolutely no arch support or padding in the sole, which was surprising and frustrating. I expect this level of quality from cheaper brands, not Keen. Overall, a big letdown.
I love these shoes but will have to return, they definitely run wide. I'm bummed because I really like them.

They were comfortable right out of the box. I’ve worn several styles of Keen footwear, and these are my favorite by far. They are lightweight, versatile and all around comfortable. True to size. I’ll be purchasing more of this shoe in the future.

These are super cute! I ordered my usual size and they fit really well. They're comfortable and didn't need any noticeable break-in time. I have since ordered the green ones and love them so much that I may order the pinks next. The shoes are made well and feel like they'll last a long time.
Great quality shoe. Wide toe box. Comfortable! If you are looking for a cushion shoe, this is not it. It has more of a minimalist feel, yet very supportive. I got the black- very sporty looking!
Product  was  exactly as described, and arrived quickly. Really nice, comfortable walking shoe.

Omg...I love these shoes.  Not only do they look awesome, they fit my "extra wide" feet!!  If you have "narrow" feet, they will be too big.  Other than the width, they are true to size.  In the past, I have usually purchased the New Balance brand.  I get a 9.5 extra wide.  But I'm tired of their styles.  I'm so grateful for other reviews that said they would fit wide feet.  So glad I took the chance.  They look just as awesome in person.  Comfort is great.  They are a medium weight.  Haven't worn them long enough to make a fair judgment on arch support.

I love these shoes! They are very comfortable! I wear them for every day wear, and I can stand in them all day without getting fatigued. The materials are all high quality and the color makes them look casual. I would highly recommend them!

I recently went on vacation and took these not only are they so cute vintage looking but they really are so comfortable. My feet didn't hurt it has a great sole nice grip. It came with dark shoes laces also but I don't think that matches very well so I kept the white. These are great for when I'm on my treadmill also. highly recommend these shoes
Love, love, love these. So comfortable right out of the box. Roomy, squishy insole, and good grip on bottom. I hope they don’t ever stop making them. Look forward to more colors being released.

The shoes looked great online and when I received them I still thought I was really going to like these shoes.  I wore them several times and kept not feeling that comfortable in them.  I have a high arch on my left foot so I thought the arch in the shoe was going to be good.  I finally decided they are not as comfortable as my old Sketcher sneakers and I went back to them.

I love these! I have always been a fan of KEENS, but this is my first time trying a sneaker like this from them.  They are very cute, I got the pink color, and I just love it! I like that it comes with an extra pair of laces in a different color/style so you can change it up and/or have backups!They are sized correctly, in my opinion, possibly even a smidge on the roomy side but not enough to make me wish I'd ordered differently.  The quality of the materials is good.  I have worn a more comfortable sneaker in my day, but these are plenty comfortable and fit well, and I will use them for a long time to come.  I think the value is fair, perhaps creeping a bit towards overpriced, but brand name shoes will do that!

I really love these sneakers. I ordered them in pink and love the color. The fit is good, these are on the roomy side, which I like, definitely not snug. I wear an 8 and ordered an 8 and I like how they feel on my feet. I need sneakers that offer pronation (keep my foot level so my ankles don’t tilt inward) and these offer great support both for my ankles and my high arch. The tongue is comfortable. The material is a little stiff right around the ankle so I will wear socks that are a bit higher than the opening of the shoe. I think this is a very good shoe for the money. I do a lot of walking and like shoes that will hold up and keep my feet happy on long walks and these do that well.

Wife here: I was very pleased with these shoes. The color is just like it was in the listing. The shoes are comfortable and easy to get on and off. They come with an extra set of laces as well which is nice. I like the grip of the sole as well. I’m very pleased with these shoes. They are cute and a good quality which is what you would expect from this brand.

I am a woman in my mid sixties and I am really picky about my footwear. These sneakers feel great on my wide feet, size 8,5. I usually wear cotton socks underneath, which are not thin, and I have no issues putting these shoes on and walking in them. They are soft, comfortable and provide good arch support. Excellent for taking long hikes in the countryside or running errands around the city. They look neat, too. Five stars!

I'm always a fan of the keen brand and this pair of shoes didn't disappoint. They are so comfortable. I have wide feet (read "wilma flintstone" feet) so it's always been difficult to find truly comfortable shoes. But these are so comfortable with lots of support.

I got so many compliments on these shoes the first time I wore them! They are really cute! People kept asking what brand they were. They have lots of support and the insoles are cushioned. My only complaint is that they made a lot of noise on the tile floors of the building when I walked
I was surprised at how comfortable theses really are. They are not fudging. The shoe does look retro so it is a look from the 70s and 80s. Nice shoe that has good grip on the soles.

These Keen women's sneakers arrived quickly and look just as pictured. They are comfortable on and have a nice cushioned insole. The rubber bottom is heavy but provides a good amount of arch support. I wore them for several hours with no complaints. I purchased the pink set, and have already considered going back to buy more colors.

评论概述: Cute and good at keeping water out
评论详情: I was surprised with how much I like the looks of this shoe. The pink color is fairly muted and goes well with the rubber-colored sole. The bottom of the shoe can be felt when walking (harder sole than expected) -- when I first wore these shoes, had some numb toes. It appears to be true to size. I walked about 10 miles in these shoes in wet/soiled grass (+ drizzling rain) and my socks remained dry. I only wish it was slightly more comfortable, but the looks of the shoes are wonderful.

评论概述: The most comfortable shoe I’ve ever worn! Supportive and roomy; Love the color and design
评论详情: I’m absolutely in love with these Keen sneakers! They fit true to size - maybe a quarter size larger. I wear a 7.5, and I find these to be roomy around the toes, and my feet feel secure without any sliding or shifting inside the shoes. Because of the excellent tread on the bottoms, they are appropriate for use on trails. But thanks to the cute design and color (I ordered pink) they are great as everyday sneakers as well. These are, without a doubt, the most comfortable pair of casual shoes I’ve ever worn. The footbed is the right balance of support and softness. I’ve walked an entire day in these Keens, and my feet still felt perfectly fine in the evening. No aches, no soreness. While they aren’t a lightweight shoe, they aren’t heavy at all. I’ve walked for miles in them, and I don’t feel weighed down - just comfortable. The quality of the materials is excellent - these sneakers are going to last me for years.
Good quality shoe. Good room in toe box. Not a lot of arch support. The bottoms look look like cleats and could be used as golf shoes.

These shoes are as described. They fit true to size. I ordered the pink color and it is a good color. They are wide enough to wear thicker socks with for me. If you need a wider toe  box these will work. Good find. Good price.

I am going to Disney and I've read good things about Keen shoes. I love the neutral color option. They are very comfortable. I was shocked that they make a woman's size 12. They fit perfectly. I would say true to size, but possibly on the wider side for women's shoes. Which works out even better for me. My normal size is a men's 10.5-11 or a women's 12, sometimes women's 11 Wide depending on the shoe. Price is midrange for what I would call a good pair of shoes.

I’m a huge fan of Keens for my kids. I’ve been buying them Seacamp water shoes for years, but have never gotten myself a pair of Keens before. These retro shoes are actually really cute for a hiking shoe, comfortable, and feel stable on uneven terrain (wore them on a rocky beach, dirt path, steep hills, etc). The white and beige color does get dirty easily, but I think they’re worth it. I wear size 6 in all of my other shoes, and these fit wide in the toe area and a half inch long. I don’t mind the extra room and can wear thick socks or my orthotics with them.

Light weight,  comfortable but not ultra comfortable.  Sizing is accurate. Waterproof. Great for hikes or outdoor work or walks. They look cute and stylish. Can be used everyday with jeans or just about any outfit. They are slightly squeaky.

评论概述: Tennis shoes are super comfortable and lightweight
评论详情: The more I wear these tennis shoes, the more I like them for comfort. They may not look like they have good cushioning at first glance, but after wearing them, I know differently. The shoes are lightweight and have a rubber bottom sole extending from the toe tip to well up the heel. The raised grid grips the surface like no other shoes I own. They provide a feeling of stability. The other feature I like is the wider toe box that doesn’t cramp my toes. These are true-to-size and out-of-the-box wearable. They also have heel tabs for getting them on, but I don’t need them. The color design is retro. They have a fabric and faux leather upper.

These are light weight. The insole is more for comfort, but they offer adequate super for knees and ankles. They could easily be switched out for orthotics if you preferred.  The toes are quite wide, allowing me to extend my pinkie toe fully to the side. I usually wear 8 wide and these for me fine.  A nice tight is that they come placed in white with a spare set of dark colored laces if you prefer that look. The green is pretty and not bright.  My only quibble is that the soles are a bit noisy. They squeak on linoleum and cream a bit on some concrete sidewalks. I'm not sure if the nose with go away with some wear or not. It isn't super loud.

Recommended by podiatrist for roomier toe box Unfortunately this style is wide all over. My foot slid around in the shoe even laced tightly. Too bad because the shoe seems well made and very cute. Would be great for a wide foot.

The left shoe is great—the right shoe is about a 1/2 inch wider and screws up the alignment of my back. Im so sad because they are cute! I’ll have to find some out in the wild and try them before I buybthem—to be sure they aren’t mismatched.

These are so comfortable I am going to be wearing them all the time.  My feet are kind of high maintenance- one foot is a half size larger than the other and the larger foot is a narrow fit.  Additionally the smaller foot has almost no arch, so it's hard to find a good pair of shoes that work for both my feet.  These are PERFECT. Both my feet feel comfortable in them, there isn't too much or too little space in either of them.  These are the "I might get them in every color" kind of shoe.

i got to say, they said size 12, and they meant it. first pair I have gotten online from anywhere that actually are the size they claim to be.  Shoes are comfortable and don't squeeze your foot. construction of them is decent and hold. These shoes you will not slip it. The grip to the ground is great. my only gripe is they squeak for the first 2 days quite loudly. after that its not as bad. I know it shows 4 but I give them a 4.5 actually. They don't do half stars. but I like them. I might think about getting a second pair.

评论概述: Very comfortable and I love the color
评论详情: I am enjoying my new Keen shoes! They are very comfortable and allow me to stand and walk around all day without my feet hurting. I love the color! I got the ones listed as forest green but to me, I would call it a teal or mossy light green color. They come with 2 sets of shoelaces so you can change them out as you wish. The set in the shoes is the traditional white flat style and the other set are the rounded laces and are brown with colors in them. I like the clean look of the white ones for now. I would recommend them!

I’m thrilled with the shoes so far. They seem very durable and are very comfortable. I felt like they might be a little big, but it’s not an issue for me at all. I wore them to the gym to lift weights and was happy with the stability and how they fit around my foot. Would highly recommend! They are a great versatile shoe and a decent price.

This is my third pair of Keen shoes, and the comfort and support don't disappoint! I have been looking for 'work appropriate' shoes that are casual (but not bright or tacky) and comfortable. - these are PERFECT! they fit true-to-size. The colors are not flashy and my 17-year-old daughter even approved (rare occurrence). She even asked if they came in her size! Big win!

I like these shoes.  They are very substantial and I can tell they will be protective of my feet.  I am EXTREMELY picky about shoes and fit - which is why I have so many (most of them don't fit just right).  I never can tell which ones I am going to like and which I won't, but I definitely like these.I am glad I did not listen to the "7.5 will fit you best based on data from customers" because I know now that if I had followed that advice, the shoes would have been tighter than I liked.  I bought the 8, which also makes sense because I have very wide feet, and I like them a lot already!Now these are not quite as smooth feeling on the inside as some other brands I've tried.  I think I'll be needing to wear socks.  But that's okay - I don't mind wearing socks, and most of the time I prefer to wear them anyway.  Included with these shoes was something that resembles paracord attached to one shoe through the laces.  I have NO idea what the point of that is, but maybe I'll eventually figure it out.At time of review, these shoes are priced at $82.48....which seems to be about in line with Keen shoes of this type in general.  I found out a long time ago, if you want a nice pair of shoes, you absolutely must get shoes that are well designed and of a higher price than ordinary shoes.
Walk everyday, have several pairs of keen which include winter wear. have other brands but was a waste of money. will continue to purchase keens. have been wearing them since 2008.
KEENは、他にも履いてますが普段にも履ける靴をと購入しました。クッションがあってほんと気に入っています。
色が濃く、グレーを想像していたら単色で地味な印象でした。履きやすさはほんとに良いですが期待値を上げすぎてしまったようです。 キーンのブルーグレーと黒の靴がほしいです。
いつも24cmの靴を履いてますが、この商品は一回り大きかったです。返品して23.5cmにしてぴったりになりました。商品自体は履きやすくて満足してます。
I want to love these shoes, they fit comfortable, look nice but they're falling apart. The sole is detaching and the stitching is co.ing out with only light wear. Very disappointed.
挺好穿的，但是码数 似乎是偏宽松性，所以还得选小半码为好
履き心地最高
keenなら間違いない。履き心地、フィット感、長距離を歩いても疲れない気持ち良いです。ジャスパーシリーズを好んで履いていますが、KS86もお勧めです。
軽い 程よく柔らい クッション性も抜群に良い 幅広特有の痛みもない とにかく自分的には過去イチで大優勝のスニーカー。 靴は2～3日休ませた方がいいと言われていますが、ついつい毎日履いてしまいます。 なので近いうちに色違いを購入する予定です。
色もソールも最高です！
Tellement confortables !  Parfait pour les pieds plus larges, enfin de la place pour mes orteils. C'est la 3e paires de souliers Keen que j'achète et pas la dernière.

I work in pharmacy and am on my feet all day. These are the shoes I wear. So comfortable. And my feet do not sweat like in other shoes. Lots of room to breath with out being too wide. Well worth the money.
いつもはジャスパー長年愛用してます。通気性もよく快適に過ごせます。サイズ感は同じです。シリーズによってつま先が狭い？ピッタリなタイプもありますが、スニーカータイプなので窮屈感も全く無いです。若干土踏まずの所に違和感を感じたりしますが、さほど気になりません。スグに馴染みます。ちょっとだけ希望を言えばキーンのシューズはもう少しだけクッションを厚く柔らかめにして頂けた方がより快適です。
幅広な自分の足にちょうどでした。
歩きやすいてす。いつも通り歩いてるつもりでもスピードが出て足の回転が速まっているような気がしました。甲高で幅広めですがいつもの靴のサイズで問題ありませんでした。買って良かったと思いました。
普段の自分のサイズでぴったりでした。もっと 幅 など きついと思っていましたが ゆとりもあり、履き心地 、デザイン 全てとても気に入ってあまりこんなことはないのでびっくりしています。梱包も綺麗でシンプルでした。
